title: What are some things that help you deal with creative anxiety? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thinking too much, instead of just starting, even randomly without apparent direction and regard for outcome will help get the creative juices flowing. Whatever the artistic activity, merely having something down to continue with will begin the creative process.

Briefly i play at being creative the atmosphere is less: self concious, critical, comparison, about perfection, linear progress, productivity I model this after kids who just play, try and if something doesn’t work/feel good, they move on to the next thing. I tease myself by asking do kids say: I did so well yesterday, i don’t know if i can do better today, i dont’ want to try. Or Johnny has the best ideas, i don’t. Johnny does perfect playing and I can’t
